channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newsom, DeSantis join forces to blast ‘idiotic’ push to allow oil drilling off coasts of California, Florida
item.description: The oil industry has been seeking access to new offshore areas, including Southern California and off the coast of Florida.

item.title: MTG hits reports she is considering running for president after announcing resignation plans
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene is slapping down reports that she is considering a 2028 presidential run, calling the speculation "a complete lie."

item.title: X's new location feature exposes apparent fraudster accounts posing as Americans, Gaza journalists
item.description: X's new location feature exposed fraudulent U.S. political accounts with large followings actually operating from Turkey and other foreign countries.

item.title: Farewell, MTG (for Now)
item.description: For all the talk of splits within MAGA, President Trump still has the power to vaporize entrenched Republican members of Congress.

item.title: NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani keeps Trump 'fascist' label after White House meeting
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is standing by his description of President Trump as a "fascist."

item.title: When Myths Become Media ‘Facts’
item.description: What excuse is there today for anyone not to double-check?

item.title: Dennis Prager’s Unbreakable Spirit
item.description: His survival after a terrible accident one year ago is a summons — to continue defending faith, moral clarity, and the American value system.

item.description: The ‘radical indoctrination’ that Trump supposedly banned persists.

item.title: Here’s Why Gavin Newsom’s Race-Based Gerrymandering In CA Will Fail

item.title: The Left Is Nowhere Near Letting Go Of Its Trans Obsession
